subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Everything is in place in Utah, where Real Salt Lake will open the newest playground in the M.L.S., Rio Tinto Stadium, with a game against the Red Bulls on Oct. 9.
snippet: Everything is in place in Utah, where Real Salt Lake will open the newest playground in the M.L.S., Rio Tinto Stadium, with a game against the Red Bulls on Oct. 9.
